name: dr--henry-s-chess-game
description: This is a cross-platform AI chess game developed by Dr. Henry and packaged by Ozan Mirza.
author: Ozan Mirza <ozan.i.mirza@gmail.com>

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . "Dr. Henry's Chess Game" --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=Assets/AppIcon/AppIcon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds/Windows --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Dr. Henry's Chess Game"
